entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Mont-Laurier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
